content.question: The historical development described in the excerpt can best be explained by which of the following related developments?

choices.label: The decrease in the number of people going to colleges and universities
The creation of a movement to stop federal desegregation efforts
The persistence of economic and racial disparity in the United States
The reduced concern about the threat of Soviet influence in the United States

content.answer: The persistence of economic and racial disparity in the United States

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
